**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 43 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 [Leng Envoy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2342) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 416 **Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +32, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +35, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +35, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +38, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +32, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +30 **Str** +5 **Dex** +6 **Con** +5 **Int** +9 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +6 **Items** _[+2 greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [keen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=300) [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)_, Leng rubies worth 300 gp, pipes --- **AC** 42 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +30 **Will** +33 **HP** 240 (planar fast healing 15) **Immunities** cold **Resistances** critical hits 20, precision 20 **No Breath** The Leng envoy doesn't need to breathe.
**Planar Fast Healing** A denizen of Leng maintains a connection to Leng at all times, and when away from Leng, they have [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 5. They lose this ability on Leng or in areas where planar connections do not function. If killed, their body dissolves into nothingness in 1d4 rounds, leaving behind their equipment. A slain denizen reforms in Leng they can be permanently killed only when their planar fast healing doesn't function. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** kukri +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 3d6+13 slashing plus 3d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Melee** jaws +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 3d10+13 piercing plus debilitating bite **Occult Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +34 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) - **2nd** [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) - **3rd** [Hypnotic Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=157), [Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170) - **4th** [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211) - **5th** [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173), [Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193) - **7th** [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) - **8th** [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315), [Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) - **9th** [Unfathomable Song](/Spells.aspx?ID=349), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) - **Constant (9th)** [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Leng Ruby** ([Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Many denizens of Leng carry strange rubies mined from quarries in Leng. As long as a creature holds a Leng ruby that it willingly accepted as a gift or payment from a denizen of Leng, any denizen of Leng can target that creature with [_mind reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=194), [_outcast's curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=211), [_phantom pain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), or [_warp mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) at a range of 1 mile, and the bearer uses an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw against outcast's curse. **Debilitating Bite** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A creature that takes damage from a denizen's bite must succeed at a DC 40 Fortitude save or become [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) 1. Each time a target fails an additional save against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of clumsy 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours. **Play the Pipes** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The Leng envoy is holding a musical instrument; **Effect** The envoy plays a melody on its instrument to cast [_uncontrollable dance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=347), [_unfathomable song_](/Spells.aspx?ID=349), or [_warp mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) without expending the spell slot and using his music in place of providing the spell's component actions. The spell gains the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait and targets all creatures in a 60-foot emanation instead of its usual targets. A creature that succeeds at its Will save against any spell is then temporarily immune from all spells played from the envoy's pipes for 1 minute. Aberrations are immune to this music.
name: Leng Envoy
